alert.note: Alert for Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richardson County through 800 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Falls City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Verdon around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stella and Shubert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
